column5: NEW LISTING!!! Our 38' Travel Trailer 2 slides is located in Crystal Beach,TX in a small RV park called Hayes Rd RV Park designed to be quiet and intimate. The Trailer has 2 queen-size (URL HIDDEN) is a convertable sofa in the living area that will sleep 2 small guests. There is a full kitchen with most everything you need to prepare meals. We try to supply everything you may need, except personal items. There is a shower in the bathroom, where we supply body washes .
